response.original_title: Last Wilderness / Hunting the Hard Way
response.overview: Legendary actor, archer and hunter Howard Hill -- a man comfortable bringing down bears, elk and other dangerous prey with just a bow -- shows off his sporting skills in this documentary double feature. The Last Wilderness follows Hill and a pal on a big-game hunting trip filled with difficult shots. The action continues in Hunting the Hard Way, featuring more of the tricks that made Hill famous.
response.title: Last Wilderness / Hunting the Hard Way
